name: Sina Zarriess
content: Sina Zarrieß Computational Linguistics Faculty for Linguistics and Literature Studies University of Bielefeld Universitätstr. 25 33615 Bielefeld Germany Office: @Home Phone: @Home Email: sina dot zarriess at uni-bielefeld dot de Secretary: Juliana Heihoff I am a professor for Computational Linguistics, at the University of Bielefeld. The general goal of my research is to build computational models of language use in text and dialogue, with applications in natural language generation, dialogue systems, language & vision. Please visit the website of the Computational Linguistics Bielefeld group for further information. Profiles: Google Scholar, ACL Anthology, ORCID Publications: PUB Uni Bielefeld
